item.title: TidyTuesday
item.description: In the first quarter of 2018, I focused my data science education on expanding my R programming skills and setting up this blog in Hugo. I developed my first R package, an API wrapper to the U.S. National Provider Identification (NPI) registry, and created an R-powered Power BI custom visual for a client…

item.title: Taking flight with R
item.description: Inspired by the current exhibit on ART ∩ MATH at Seattle’s Center on Contemporary Cart (COCA), I decided to replicate one of the pieces by the very talanted Iranian mathematical artist, Hamid Naderi Yeganeh…
